article: Ted likes fish very much. His father buys him  _  small fish on his birthday. Then they  _  a pond in the garden for the fish. His father puts lots of rocks and plants near the pond,  _  the fish can't get too hot in summer. Ted puts all the fish in the pond and gives them  _  every two days. Soon the small fish get  _  . One day, Ted goes to the pond and  finds  there are only five fish. He says to himself, "A fish is lost.  _  can it get out of the pond?" Then he calls his father out. His father comes out of the house and check the pond first, then the garden. He sees a black cat run away."  _  fish is in the cat's stomach ,"Dad tells Ted. Ted is sad, "What can we do now?" he asks. Dad goes to the house and then comes back with a net .He puts it  _  the pond. "Now the fish will not get  _  ," Dad says.
